tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 'When you truly want something, the entire universe conspires to make it happen. You just have to ask for the impossible, in prayer.'I was diagnosed with stage IV Adenomyosis and endometriosis; blocked tubes. I was left with no hopes what so ever of conceiving.Time was ticking away too! I consider myself extremely fortunate to have crossed paths with Dr. Anupama Ashok. She has been the driving force right from inception. What seemed impossible in the beginning, she literally made me walk baby steps. Dr. Anupama is such a humble and down to earth person. You rarely come across such a gem of a person. She exactly knows what she is doing and even the times I doubted myself, she held up my spirits. She has this beautiful aura that you just want to close your eyes and let her lead you. She has this unshakeable faith in God and in everything she does. Her expertise in the field is unparalleled. She has an excellent team working for her at Amogha Fertility Clinic. No fancy clinic, no pompous showoff , no handing out exorbitant IVF packages. Her simplicity is what drew me to her and made me believe strongly. Right from inception, she has always explained each and everything in a clear manner. Despite being so busy, she has answered all my queries over call or whatsapp, checked on me. Just by meeting her and talking to her, half of my worries were put to rest. I knew I was at the right place! She has this calm persona! She went out of her way and helped us out. It's through her sheer determination, expert guidance and unshakeable faith in God that has made the miracle happen. I got pregnant with 1 cycle of Frozen Embryo Transfer. I and my husband will forever be indebted to her. I want each and every couple battling infertility to reach out to Dr. Anupama Ashok at Amogha Fertility Clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anupama Mam is very humble and she treats patients with much care and love. She gives so much positive energy and she will motivate us in tough situation.. We feel  blessed to take treatment under her guidance.The way she speaks so polite and as if we are speaking to our family member .it was IVF and it worked for us in first cycle. Lots of love and respect. If we are experiencing the joy of a positive result is only due to her continuous help and efforts. And also we should thankfull to  whole staffing team they are very polite and kind

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Anupama is an excellent human being and more than a Doctor for us, she takes personal care for every patient.We had been to many hospitals and doctors in 6 years of maritial life having failed treatments on child bearing.but she gave us a positive hope with a right treatment giving us success and helping us achieve our dream come true.Very positive doctor and has a best embryology team.higly approachable and reachable in whatsapp for all the queries. Thankyou very much for extended support towards my infertility treatment and i highly recommend you to all who is suffering from primary infertility issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ****  *** *** ***** ****** *** **** ****** **** * **** ***** You are so sincere, kind, caring and concerned. We are really blessed to have you as a doctor.  Thank you for being so dedicate and giving me the strength in difficult situation. I wholeheartedly suggest every one,  and loudly say If one needs happiness just step towards you.   Because after great struggle I met you to face my life's challenge and felt very safe. Yes,  blessed with all happiness of my life and the reason is only you. 
 From now on.. Everyday of my life will be better only because of you. You have lots of patience and thank you for being so helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy,Recurrent Pregnancy Loss,
review: Dr. Anupama Ashok is extremely tolerant, polite and understanding. She patiently listened to our problems with pregnancy and asked us lot of questions to make sure she is well informed about our history, lifestyle and how we have landed into this situation. She is very practical and stirs up lot of confidence in us. Her counselling technique is very efficient and helped us immensely through our ups and downs. She and her team put in a lot of efforts and try their level best, through their skills and experience, to make sure that the patient walks out happy, with a positive pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is highly impatient. She doesn't understand the emotion of the patient. Her talk depends on how well you dress and what language you speak. Upon all she doesn't remember what she says and always says patient is incorrect for everything. ** *** ****** **** ***** ******** *** ******* ***** **** **** Anupama is highly not recommended. I agree she charges less and procedure cost is less but when that comes at the cost of low maintained clinic and dirty hospital without basic infrastructure. **** ******** **** ****** ** *** ****** *** ******* **** ** **** **** ** *** ** *** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had the good luck of meeting Dr Anupama Ashok after a long and tiring journey of trying to conceive. My husband and I are 37yrs of age and do not have any diagnosed fertility issues. Previous doctors scared us and put us through multiple failed medicated , IUI and IVF cycles resulting in complete lack of confidence in us to have a baby.

It was at this stage we met Dr. Anupama Ashok -  I was able to find hope right from our first consultation. She is methodical, thorough and has so much clarity in what steps to take to achieve our objective. She is patient and is always forthcoming in explaining the process clearly and answering all our questions. She makes you feel in control and includes you as an integral part of the decision making process.

She uses the best quality meds,  individualised protocols and latest research to achieve optimum results -  our first cycle itself has been successful with her and we are on our way to having a healthy child.

She is constantly in touch with us and checks on us to see if everything is going fine - even when we are transferred to a gynaecologist. We are so happy to have met such a kind human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Anupama ma'am was referred to us by another very well known doctor after I, Aruna, suffered ectopic pregnancy. We decided to approach her for the treatment. She was very kind, calm and composed. Before going through treatment she would explain all the stages and also everything I would go through. Anupama ma'am was very careful about the process initiation as she knew exactly which cycle would be more effective. She wouldn't delegate everything to subordinates as she followed the tests and results closely. We would visit her diligently as we had put all our faith on her. Though the first time I didn't conceive, Anupama ma'am gave confidence to us explaining the reason why it was not positive and persuaded to try again. We decided to try another time. There were times when the process was getting delayed for unforeseen issues and we were feeling uneasy. Nevertheless, we persisted to follow and finally the efforts bore fruit. Today we are parents to a healthy boy, our bundle of joy!! Words fall short of expressing gratitude to her. Thank you Dr Anupama Ma'am!! Following this success story, we have recommended to another relative, and she too will have a success story waiting to be told ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I, Kirti, am a native of Mumbai.  Being aged 35+, I had lost count of number of times I have undergone IUI and IVF at very well known fertility experts in Mumbai, but to no avail. I was closely following my sister's fertility treatment. And when the efforts bore fruit, I had a ray of hope. Though my body had known the pain of those injections piercing me umpteen number of times, I decided to try one last time. I had to give up my flourishing career and I was mentally prepared for that too. As my sister said Dr Anupama ma'am was very kind, calm and composed. She would closely follow the cycles, my tests and results. During the pandemic, she had advised to postpone the treatment which again increased my anxiety. Finally she herself called up asking to undergo the test again. Her attention to detail and the sense of urgency impressed me a lot! Today I have a success story growing in me. Thank you Dr Anupama Ma'am. As my sister says, Words fall short of expressing gratitude to her! I would recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We met Anupama Mam to consult about issue with conceiving. The way she speaks and explains the issues and treatments, it really gives a positive vibe and hope.  She made sure of conducting all possible tests and prescribed required medicines. She was our pillar of strength till we conceive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met Dr. Anupama Ashok at Columbia Asia hospital. She is kind and truthful.  She treats everyone with personal care. She is very friendly.  I heard many positive results from my friends and relatives. Her treatment procedure is excellent.  I happily suggest her to every one. She is the best , way to get the gynic problems resolved. Thank you for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pregnancy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Follicular Scan,Recurrent Pregnancy Loss,
review: I have consulted Dr Anupama Ashok for my infertility and pre pregnancy counselling. We as a couple were educated on the pros and cons of the implications of modern medicine. We were extremely satisfied with her knowledge and her ability to explain complex things in a simpler way.  I would definitely recommend Dr Anupama Ashok for all her support which has led us towards a positive pregnancy result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: We have been associated with dr Anupama for about 3 years now and has been a wonderful experience. Through this journey of infertility she has been of great help and very patient and positive. If we are experiencing the joy of a positive result is only due to her continuous help and efforts.  We have been able to connect with her on a personal level which provided me with lots of comfort to keep postive through the entire journey. Highly recommend dr Anupama for any fertility related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am diptee..I met doctor Anupama  before 3 month s for my infertility jourey..she is very friendly doctor I never seen anywhere.. After 3 month of medication no positive result seen ..this month I m going to do iui treatment.. After iui done if positive result will come I ll definitely recommend my friends & relative whom treatment need..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Anupama Ashok has lot of patience n very friendly . The way she speaks so polite and as if we are speaking to our family member . This increases comfort zone..I highly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from infertility since 6 years, my reative referred me here and in first month only I conceived.. I am very thankful to Dr. Anupama Ashok from my bottom of my heart. In first visit only I was very confident after speaking with doctor she take care of patients very well, very supportive and she clears  all your doubts with patience. so whom so ever suffering from infertility please do visit the doctor without any second thought and further delay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Absolutely no patience and the way she spoke to us was very rude. We almost waited for 2hrs and had multiple questions to ask, but her approach towards us was pathetic which made us feel very uncomfortable and we never felt like asking any questions.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am not happy , because she is very angry ,and the way she replied is very rude ,and I not even suggest her...I was very disappointed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: she is an awesome human being,very friendly and supportive,she solved our problem within few days and made us parents to a beautiful son
